title: We Finally Get to Watch Conan O’Brien Wander Around Greenland
text:
After weeks of build-up and coy Instagram posts, the Conan Without Borders: Greenland special aired last night, following Conan O’Brien as he toured Greenland in an attempt to buy it. The trip, which was inspired by a comment from Donald Trump about possibly buying Greenland, features a tireless O’Brien as he fights icy conditions and encounters bewildered locals, who treat him with an achingly polite Scandinavian remove. “No,” answers a man on the street when Conan asks if he is a Trump supporter, “But I would like to thank him for the publicity he’s given Greenland.” Well played, sir.

Related
description: In a new episode of Conan Without Borders, Conan O’Brien visited Greenland following Donald Trump’s comment about buying the country.
